title: Efficient computation of the running discrete Haar transform
abstract: This paper presents a new algorithm to compute the running discrete Haar wavelet transform of N samples which reduces the computational complexity to O(log/sub 2/(N)).

tldr.text: A new algorithm is presented to compute the running discrete Haar wavelet transform of N samples which reduces the computational complexity to O(log/sub 2/(N)).
